body:
this also happens with contacts, calendar, notes and music:
```
enableapp: notes true 
[input.enable hidden, context: input.enable hidden, jquery: "1.10.0", constructor: function, init: function, selector: ""…]
 apps.js:69
get http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/settings/ajax/navigationdetect.php?app=notes 500 (internal server error) jquery-1.10.0.min.js?v=d81f29a9985d0eb4adc0279e79a9ec75:6
enableapp: calendar true 
[input.enable hidden, context: input.enable hidden, jquery: "1.10.0", constructor: function, init: function, selector: ""…]
 apps.js:69
enableapp: contacts true 
[input.enable hidden, context: input.enable hidden, jquery: "1.10.0", constructor: function, init: function, selector: ""…]
 apps.js:69
get http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/settings/ajax/navigationdetect.php?app=contacts 500 (internal server error) jquery-1.10.0.min.js?v=d81f29a9985d0eb4adc0279e79a9ec75:6
enableapp: music true 
[input.enable hidden, context: input.enable hidden, jquery: "1.10.0", constructor: function, init: function, selector: ""…]
 apps.js:69
get http://localhost/owncloud/index.php/settings/ajax/navigationdetect.php?app=music 500 (internal server error) jquery-1.10.0.min.js?v=d81f29a9985d0eb4adc0279e79a9ec75:6

```
(calendar didn’t give an error, but it still didn’t hide.) cc @ringmaster also.
